casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James H. TERRELL, Jr. 55A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2018

Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, James Howard Terrell, Jr., Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Terrell, James Howard (Jr.) Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 28th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
